General.Name: Fresh Grapes LLC
General.Description: Fresh Vine Wine, Inc. produces and sells low-carb and low-calorie wines in the United States and Puerto Rico. Its wine varietals include Cabernet Sauvignon, Pinot Noir, Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Rosé, and Sparkling Rosé. The company sells its products through wholesale, retail, and direct-to-consumer channels. Fresh Vine Wine, Inc. was founded in 2019 and is based in Minnetonka, Minnesota.
General.Address: 505 Highway 169 North, Plymouth, MN, United States, 55441
